title: Patching/Repair not working
body:
My patcher won't patch. At the top, it says "calculating differences" and then the "files scanned." the number of files keeps going up for both patching and repairing.
How many files are there for patch 6.20?
how can I fix this?

replies.body: it take a while for scanning files, even more so for repairing, and sometimes, when you close it midway, it start again from the beginning the next time you have it on ‎(ﾉಥ益ಥ）ﾉ﻿ ┻━┻ ....... anyways, the files are around 3.5k for me (like, the total files scanning, idk how many for the patch :/)

Unless you are receiving any errors, it's best to let the patcher keep working and do its thing.  If you close out during the process, the patcher can result in scanning every game file to check for corruption.  If it is taking an unusually long time, I recommend checking our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide in case the patcher is being preventing from scanning game files.  Let me know if you have any questions!
